about_page.title: About Us
about_page.subtitle:
WeApnea is the first platform dedicated to freediving events in Italy.
The community consists of instructors, coaches, competitive athletes and freediving enthusiasts, both indoor and outdoor.
For years, we lived with a fragmented and poorly connected reality: events scattered across forums, social groups and word of mouth. There was no single reference point to find training camps, workshops, courses, educational opportunities, trips and to give the discipline we love the proper visibility and accessibility.
So we thought it was time to create a Piazza (meeting place) for all of us freedivers.
We decided to offer the entire community a reference point for the usual questions: what‚Äôs out there? What‚Äôs happening?
WeApnea was thus born with a clear goal: to make freediving more accessible, visible and connected.
What can you find here?
Freediving events and training sessions organized by certified instructors or freediving schools. Testimonials, ideas, networking and much more.
We are not a federation. We are not an educational organization. We are not just any social network.
We are a meeting point of experiences offered with transparency. An accelerator for those who want to live freediving as a journey of growth in the water and within themselves.
And this is only the beginning...
about_page.mission_desc:
Connect freedivers from all over the world through a platform that facilitates participation in events, trips and educational activities.
We want to make freediving more accessible, give transparency to what‚Äôs out there and create a global community of enthusiasts.
about_page.vision_desc:
To become the international point of reference for freediving events.
To be the Piazza where every freediver can find opportunities for growth, share experiences and authentic connections with other community members.

values.community_desc: We believe in the power of community and sharing experiences to grow together as freedivers and continue to improve what we offer.
values.passion_desc: Freediving is our passion and we want it to be accessible through unforgettable events and experiences.
values.innovation_desc: We use technology to make freediving more accessible and connect freedivers around the world.

about_page.team_desc:
We are a team founded on a long friendship and composed of professionals from different fields.
Our union was inspired by the great passion for freediving of Pol (Paolo Frigo) and by a shared desire to promote moments of socialization and exchange, to honor nature and the aquatic environment, to get involved with commitment and favor the growth of the discipline. But it is only with you that we can try to create the best possible experience for the freediving community:
the real team is WeApnea!

privacy_policy.title: WeApnea ‚Äì Privacy Policy (EU/GDPR)
privacy_policy.intro: This notice describes how personal data of users who visit and use the website www.weapnea.com (hereinafter "Website") is processed.

titolare.title: 1. Data Controller
titolare.content:
WeApnea (sports project in the process of legal formalization)
üìß Contact email: weapnea@gmail.com
üìç Legal office: To be determined ‚Äì legal structure in the registration phase.
This notice will be updated with complete company details upon formalization of the legal entity (e.g. company or association).

tipologie.title: 2. Types of data processed
items: Data voluntarily provided by the user via contact form, email or newsletter subscription (e.g. name, surname, email, any information related to sports practice entered voluntarily).
Browsing data automatically collected (IP, browser, device, pages visited) for statistical and security purposes.
Cookies and similar technologies, as described in the Cookie Policy.

finalita.title: 3. Purposes of processing
items: Respond to user requests or contacts
Manage any subscriptions to services or newsletters (only with explicit consent)
Manage communities, athlete profiles or participation in sports/events
Perform aggregated statistical analyses to improve the Website
Fulfill any legal obligations in case of commercial collaborations or sponsorships

basi.title: 4. Legal bases (Art. 6 GDPR)
items: Performance of contractual or pre-contractual measures at the user's request
Explicit consent for marketing or profiling purposes
Legitimate interest for anonymous statistical analysis and site security

conservazione.title: 5. Data retention
conservazione.content: Data is retained for the time necessary for the purpose for which it was collected or until a deletion request. Data used for promotional purposes is retained until consent is revoked.

terzi.title: 6. Communication to third parties
items: Technical providers (e.g. hosting, newsletter, analytics tools)
Partners or sponsors only with explicit user consent
Competent authorities in case of regulatory obligations
No transfer to third parties for unauthorized commercial purposes is expected.

diritti.title: 7. User rights (Arts. 15‚Äì22 GDPR)
items: Access your data
Request correction or deletion
Restrict or object to processing
Revoke consent at any time

sicurezza.title: 8. Security
sicurezza.content: WeApnea adopts appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, loss or alteration.

minori.title: 9. Minors
minori.content: Unless otherwise indicated, the Website services are reserved for adult users. Any data provided by minors will be deleted upon notification.

modifiche.title: 10. Changes
modifiche.content: This notice may be updated. Relevant changes will be communicated on the Website or by email to registered users.

cosa-sono.title: 1. What are cookies
cosa-sono.content: Cookies are small files saved on the user's device to improve navigation and enable certain features.

tipologie.title: 2. Types of cookies used
items: Technical / Necessary: site functionality (e.g. language, login) ‚Äì do not require consent.
Statistical (anonymized): visit analysis (e.g. Google Analytics with anonymized IP) ‚Äì require consent.
Marketing / Profiling: remarketing and content personalization ‚Äì require consent.

consenso.title: 3. Consent management
consenso.content: Upon first access, a cookie banner is displayed allowing you to accept all cookies, reject non-essential ones, or manage preferences. The user can change preferences at any time via the browser or via a "Cookie Settings" link on the Website.

browser.title: 4. Disabling via browser
browser.content: The user can manage cookies from their browser settings (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc.). Disabling technical cookies may compromise some Website functionalities.

terze-parti.title: 5. Third-party tools
terze-parti.content: The Website may use external services such as Google Analytics or social pixels. In the case of marketing cookies, these are activated only with explicit consent.

contatti.title: 6. Contacts
contatti.content: For clarifications or requests regarding data or cookie management: weapnea@gmail.com

welcome.subject: Welcome to the WeApnea Community!
welcome.body:
Thank you for joining the WeApnea Community.

You can now fill in your profile details in the Member Area (top right) and stay updated on all published activities.

If you are a certified instructor, you can also start publishing your upcoming events!

WeApnea has only recently launched and, as we are still in the testing phase, your feedback or comments would be invaluable to us.

Thank you for supporting us in this dive toward a more inclusive and collaborative freediving experience.
welcome.signature:
Best,
Paolo and the WeApnea Team
